name: Roots & Rats
description:
Submitted for the Global Game Jam 2023 & ICT GameJam Winter 2023 with the theme being "Root"

GGJ2023: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/roots-rats-8

You play as a rat who must defend your potted plant companion from the evil Fungi monsters.

Gameplay: Defend your potted plant from the hordes of Fungi and other bizarre enemies as it grows on each stage. 4 stages with the last one having a boss!

Controller recommended but works with mouse and keyboard for 1st Player ONLY.

Controls:

  • Attack: Left Mouse Btn: / A
  • Pick up: Right Mouse Btn / B
  • Movement: WASD / Left Stick
  • Skip to next Level: N (Keyboard Only)
  • Reset Level: R (Keyboard Only)

Team:

  • Programmer: Ramil Hinshaw
  • Artist: Desiree Hinshaw
  • Artist: Reanna Hinshaw

Credits:

  • SFX: Ultimate SFX Bundle
  • Music: Kent Kercher

Timelapse:
